itemLabel: Gavin Astor, 2nd Baron Astor of Hever

wikipedia_page.main: Gavin Astor, 2nd Baron Astor of Hever (1 June 1918 – 28 June 1984), was an English soldier, publisher, peer, and member of the Astor family.

response: *** 15px The Right Hon. Gavin Astor, 2nd Baron Astor of Hever (1918 - 1984)

link_mentions.page: John Jacob Astor, 1st Baron Astor of Hever
response: * Gavin Astor, 2nd Baron Astor of Hever (1 June 1918 - 28 June 1984), married Lady Irene Haig, youngest daughter of Douglas Haig, 1st Earl Haig, and Dorothy Maud Vivian, and had five children including John Jacob "Johnny" Astor VIII.

response: *Gavin Astor, 2nd Baron Astor of Hever (1918–1984), President, Times newspapers, 1967–1981

link_mentions.page: Violet Astor, Baroness Astor of Hever
response: **Gavin Astor, 2nd Baron Astor of Hever (1918–1984), eldest son and heir of his father, who married Lady Irene Haig, the youngest daughter of Douglas Haig, 1st Earl Haig, by whom he had five children including John Jacob Astor VIII ("Johnny" Astor)

On 27 July 1931, Myddelton was married to Lady Mary Margaret Elizabeth Petty-Fitzmaurice (1910–2003), who usually went by the her middle name, Margaret. a daughter of Maj. Lord Charles Petty-Fitzmaurice and his wife, the former Lady Violet Elliot-Murray-Kynymound (daughter of Gilbert Elliot-Murray-Kynynmound, 4th Earl of Minto). Her younger brother was George Petty-Fitzmaurice, 8th Marquess of Lansdowne. After Mary's father was killed in action at Ypres in 1914, her mother remarried to MP for Dover John Jacob Astor, 1st Baron Astor of Hever (fourth son of William Waldorf Astor, 1st Viscount Astor). From her mother's second marriage, she had three half-siblings, including Gavin Astor, 2nd Baron Astor of Hever and John Astor, MP for Newbury. Together, Lady Margaret and Ririd were the parents of:

link_mentions.page: John Astor, 3rd Baron Astor of Hever
response: Astor was born 16 June 1946. He is the eldest of the five children of Gavin Astor, 2nd Baron Astor of Hever, and Lady Irene Haig. Astor succeeded to the peerage after his father died from cancer in June 1984. His younger siblings are Bridget, Elizabeth, Sarah, and Philip.
*Gavin Astor, 2nd Baron Astor of Hever (191884), British publisher
